body: Program exits after images are downloaded and the user must manually restart the application. A better user experience could be obtained if the program could "reload" the images after the download is completed instead of requiring the user to start the application again.

title: program must be restarted after images are downloaded

comments.body:
main issue is with symbol icons, in 1.14 the symbol icons are automatically reloaded after images are downloaded.

**Status:** Fixed

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on May 27, 2011 22:20:18_

Program exits after images are downloaded and the user must manually restart the application. A better user experience could be obtained if the program could "reload" the images after the download is completed instead of requiring the user to start the application again.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=17_
